Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: complete WorkoutLog Android app

Full-featured workout logging app built with Kotlin, Jetpack Compose,
Material 3, Room, Hilt, and MVVM architecture. Includes workout type
and entry CRUD, monthly calendar overview, reports with charts,
Excel/PDF export, JSON backup/restore, theming, onboarding, and search.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
